tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE medications (
    medication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    medication_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    prescriber_id INT NOT NULL,
    prescription_date DATE NOT NULL,
    dosage INT NOT NULL,
    frequency VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    refill_allowed BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE prescriptions (
    prescription_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    medication_name VARCHAR(50),
    dosage INT,
    frequency VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    address VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE prescriptions (
    prescription_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    medication_name VARCHAR(50),
    dosage FLOAT,
    issued_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE medication_errors (
    error_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    prescription_id INT,
    error_type VARCHAR(50),
    error_description TEXT,
    error_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE prescriptions (
  prescription_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  medication_name VARCHAR(255),
  dosage VARCHAR(50),
  frequency VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE medication_log (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  prescription_id INT,
  patient_id INT,
  physician_id INT,
  date_time TIMESTAMP,
  action VARCHAR(50)
);
CREATE TABLE prescriptions ( prescription_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, medication_name VARCHAR(255), dosage INT, prescription_date DATE );
CREATE TABLE patients ( patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_name VARCHAR(255), date_of_birth DATE, gender VARCHAR(10), address VARCHAR(255) );
CREATE TABLE doctors ( doctor_id INT PRIMARY KEY, doctor_name VARCHAR(255), specialty VARCHAR(50) );
CREATE TABLE pharmacies ( pharmacy_id INT PRIMARY KEY, pharmacy_name VARCHAR(255), location VARCHAR(255) );
CREATE TABLE medication_errors ( error_id INT PRIMARY KEY, prescription_id INT, error_description TEXT, error_date DATE );
